title: Polygon, StarkWare Tout New 'Circle STARKs' as Breakthrough for Zero-Knowledge Proofs
description: Circle STARKs are supposed to accelerate the proving process for zero-knowledge rollups, according to a white paper published by Polygon Labs and StarkWare.

title: The Protocol: Restaking Tokens Are Exploding, and Restaking Isn't Even Live
description: In this week's issue of our weekly blockchain tech newsletter, Sam Kessler explores how "liquid restaking tokens" or LRTs are remaking decentralized finance. PLUS: Starknet's STRK airdrop, Stellar's smart-contract facelift and bitcoin's supply crunch.

title: BNB Chain surpasses 1 million daily active users mark
description: BNB Chain sets sights on 2024 growth, leveraging multi-chain for DeFi, gaming, AI, and decentralized infrastructure.

title: Crypto Markets Experience Minor Setback as Major Coins Dip, While Select Tokens Buck the Trend
description: On Wednesday, the crypto market experienced a modest downturn, with a 1% decrease in its overall value across the board, as bitcoin and ethereum saw declines of 0.51% and 0.45%, respectively. Bitcoin momentarily reached the $53,000 mark the day prior, while ether soared past the $3,000 threshold on Tuesday, though both cryptocurrencies traded significantly lower […]

title: Fundstrat co-founder: Bitcoin to hit $150k in 2024
description: Fundstrat co-founder Thomas J. Lee predicted a 2024 high of $150,000 for Bitcoin due to demand, supply dynamics, and spot ETFs.

title: Tron and Stacks rally, Kelexo set for more gains
description: Tron and Stacks are firm, rallying. Meanwhile, investors expect Kelexo to also edge higher in 2024

title: Do Kwon Will Be Extradited to United States Following Montenegro Court Ruling: Report
description:
Do Kwon, former crypto billionaire and founder of the Terra (LUNA) ecosystem, will be sent to the United States to face fraud charges. In 2022, Terra’s UST stablecoin and its associated altcoin LUNA went to virtually zero after its pegging mechanism didn’t work as intended, wiping out roughly $40 billion in value within days. Kwon […]
